briefTitle: An Open-label Trial of Clevidipine for Controlled Hypotension During Spinal Fusion

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Spinal fusion for neuromuscular scoliosis.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Allergy to dihydropyridine calcium channel antagonists
* Allergy to soy or eggs
* Non-neuromuscular causes of scoliosis
* Disorders of lipid metabolism (clevidipine is in a lipid base)

outcomeMeasures.title: Time to Achieve Target MAP
outcomeMeasures.description: The time between start of clevidipine infusion and patient reaching target mean arterial pressure (MAP) at 55-65 mmHg
